output:
Map {
Baseball Application {
  User Story: 
    - As a user, I want to be able to view the latest baseball scores and standings
    - As a user, I want to be able to search for specific teams and players
    - As a user, I want to be able to view detailed stats for teams and players
    - As a user, I want to be able to view upcoming games and schedules
    - As a user, I want to be able to view highlights and replays of games
    - As a user, I want to be able to customize my experience with notifications and alerts
    - As a user, I want to be able to access the application on multiple devices
  Design:
    - Design a user interface that is intuitive and easy to use
    - Design a search feature that allows users to quickly find teams and players
    - Design a stats page that displays detailed stats for teams and players
    - Design a page that displays upcoming games and schedules
    - Design a page that displays highlights and replays of games
    - Design a page that allows users to customize their experience with notifications and alerts
    - Design a page that allows users to access the application on multiple devices
  Development:
    - Develop a user interface that is intuitive and easy to use
    - Develop a search feature that allows users to quickly find teams and players
    - Develop a stats page that displays detailed stats for teams and players
    - Develop a page that displays upcoming games and schedules
    - Develop a page that displays highlights and replays of games
    - Develop a page that allows users to customize their experience with notifications and alerts
    - Develop a page that allows users to access the application on multiple devices
  Testing:
    - Test the user interface to ensure it is intuitive and easy to use
    - Test the search feature to ensure it is accurate and fast
    - Test the stats page to ensure it is displaying accurate information
    - Test the page that displays upcoming games and schedules to ensure it is accurate
    - Test the page that displays highlights and replays of games to ensure it is accurate
    - Test the page that allows users to customize their experience with notifications and alerts to ensure it is working properly
    - Test the page that allows users to access the application on multiple devices to ensure it is working properly
  }
}
